scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../.env npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.prisma:generate: cd backend && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../.env npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:seed: cd backend && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../.env npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:studio: cd backend && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../.env npx prisma studio
